e: ￹`Ma~`lecad~ `ko~ `riko'~ `ita~.￺We have the same kind of clothes.￻我們衣服裝扮相似
￹`Mi~`lecad~ `cingra~ `to~ `demak~ `ako~.￺He imitated what I did.￻他模仿我的做法
￹`Pa~`lecad~`en~ `ita~ `ko~ `demak~.￺Let's do the activity the same way.￻讓我們做的事情相同
￹`Ma~`leca~`lecad~ `ko~ `tayal~ `ita~.￺Our jobs are similar.￻我們職業相似
